name: Safeguard (itch)
description:
Humanity lives on the back of a turtle who is slowly dying due to pollution and it is up to your team to protect the environment! 
This is a turn-based strategy game with an environmentalism theme featuring resource gathering, building, and depolluting mechanics.

If you're ever confused with the game, remember to refer to the tutorial or the README for detailed instructions. 

This game is Windows only.
